summary.para: Represents intra refresh settings for video encoding.

remarks.para: When triggering an intra-refresh session, the host informs the current frame number relative to the [0..IntraRefreshDuration) session by setting IntraRefreshFrameIndex in the picture control structures.

summary.para: A value from the enumeration specifying the intra refresh mode.

A UINT64 specifying the duration of the intra-refresh session, as a number of frames . For D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_INTRA_REFRESH_MODE_ROW_BASED, this value and the frame height define the size of the I rows for the duration of the IR session.
